summary: NOBODY'S PERFECT is a documentary which shows Niko von Glasow's search for eleven people who, like him, were born disabled due to the side effects of the drug thalidomide. These eleven ... See full summary »
cast: Fred Dove|Mat Fraser|Stefan Fricke|Sigrid Kwella|Andreas Meyer|Kim Morton|Doris Pakendorf|Sofia Plich|Petra Uttenweiler|Bianca Vogel|Mandel von Glasow|Niko von Glasow|Theo Zavelberg
title: NoBody's Perfect
